item.title: About this site
item.description:
About this site  

We hope you like our new-look help docs which make use of richer formatting to make the articles easier to read, particularly those with code snippets or command-line instructions. We’ve also changed the way we manage the source content so it’s easier for us to maintain. There’s still more to do, to re-organise some of the content and add new pages to reflect how JASMIN is evolving. This site should redirect you from any previous URLs you may have stored, but please use the following features to help you navigate around the site:
